nodes.text: The Annihilator X-12 was a powerful tripedal battle droid that was stationed in the assembly line of the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra. During the Cold War, it was destroyed by Imperial forces that invaded the factory.

The Annihilator X-12 appears as a bonus boss in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, where it can be found by activating a computer terminal in the Assembly Line of the Okara Droid Factory—a Heroic area in the Imperial version of Balmorra.
